sections.heading: Creation of State of Michigan Investment Board Within Department of Treasury; Transfer of Powers and Duties of State Treasurer Created Under Public Employee Retirement System Investment Act or Authorizing Statutes to the Board; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Investment Advisory Committee Created U
sections.text: Creation of State of Michigan Investment Board Within Department of Treasury; Transfer of Powers and Duties of State Treasurer Created Under Public Employee Retirement System Investment Act or Authorizing Statutes to the Board; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Investment Advisory Committee Created Under MCL 16.191 to the Board; Abolishment of Investment Advisory Committee.
